document_data.mainbody:
Skeemo Weirdbottle () was a rock gnome agent of the Zhentarim, operating within the city of Waterdeep during the late 15 century DR.
Skeemo had no loyalty to his friends.
Skeemo was a member of the Doom Raiders adventuring company. He and his former companions composed the leadership of the Zhentarim of Waterdeep. Skeemo secretly spied on his former companions under the  payroll of the House Gralhund and Manshoons Zhentarim. 
Skeemo was once an adventurer but together with his adventuring companions he decided to join the Zhentarim. In 1489 DR, they were sent to establish a Zhent foothold in Waterdeep.
In 1492 DR, as a cover, Skeemo  managed a shop in the Trades Ward, Weirdbottles Concoctions, where he sold non-magical potions.
